title: Senior Flutter / Android Developer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Kogta Financial India Limited Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
• Develop Mobile application using Android Flutter/Xamrine.
  • Suggest and implement new mobile products, applications and protocols.
  • Remain up to date with the terminology, concepts, and best practices for coding mobile apps.
  • Work closely with colleagues to constantly innovate app functionality and design.
  • Use and adapt existing web applications for apps.
  • Minimum 5 years of demonstrable experience in Android Flutter/Xamrine.
  • Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code.
  • Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code.
  • Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
  • Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services.
  • Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
  • Ability to design applications around natural user interfaces, such as touch.
  • Familiarity with the use of additional sensors, such as gyroscopes and accelerators.
  • Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks.
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications.
  • A knack for bench-marking and optimization.
  • Understanding of Googles Android design principles and interface guidelines. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
  • Familiarity with continuous integration.
What we're looking for:
  • Have two or more iOS/Android apps developed with Flutter.
  • Either deployed on the AppStore/Google Play or available on GitHub
  • 5 + years in mobile software development.
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
  • Understanding of the Agile development life cycle.
  • Experience with automated testing and building.
  • Experience with Git, SVN, or other version control tools.
  • Proven experience in writing readable code, creating extensive documentation for existing code, and refactoring previously written code
  • Agile Application Development, Android Development, Android SDK, Flutter, Mobile Applications, IOS/ Android.

Additional Requirements:

  • Good communication skills
  • Has previously executed at least one full stack project
  • Location: Jaipur and Pune, may need to travel if required.
  • Willing to travel abroad if required.
  • Full-time Should be a good listener and be able to work effectively in a team.
  • Should be a proactive individual and be able to work independently with minimal hand holding over a period.

title: Research Associate - In-vivo Biology (Oncology)
jobDescription:
• Preparation of reagents and drugs forvarious tests-
    Preparation of formulation for animaldosing.Preparation of reagents for inhalationchallenge or oral challenge. Preparationof anesthesia for laboratory animals

  • Execution of various in-vivo experiments-
    Establishment and validation of newanimal models for oncology research. Evaluation of efficacy of NCEs in animalmodels of oncology. Dosing of animals byintraperitoneal / oral / subcutaneous / intratracheal route.Blood collection from retro-orbital routeor tail vein or terminal bleeding of theanimals.Broncho alveolar lavage of the animals.Storage of plasma/serum samples ortissues.

  • Inspection of laboratory animals andhandling animal drug administration -
    Selection of animals of appropriate age,gender and weight.Animal sensitization with variousantigens by various routes.Animal randomization.Fasting of the animals.Preparation of animals for oral, dermalor inhalation challenges

  • Processing, analysis and compilation ofdata in the form of journals-
    Separation of Plasma/serum fromblood.Entering the data in the excel or graphpad prism software.

  • Coordinating with DMPK for samplesubmission -
    Prepare format for sample submissionto DMPK and submit the samplesaccordingly.

  • Maintaining lab inventory -
    Entering new chemicals in theinventory.Maintenance of NCE log books. Regularupdating of chemical inventory.New indents for chemicals.

  • Innovation -
    Refinement of existing animal models ofinflammation, support in new targetideation, establishment of newlaboratory techniques.

title: Senior React Native Developer
jobDescription:
We are seeking a mobile web developer with demonstrated experience designing and implementing enterprise scale web solutions. The ideal candidate will bring both strategic vision and solid execution skills to create responsive web applications for mobile and the desktop.


Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop scalable web applications using open source technologies
  • Develop responsive web application UIs using HTML5, CSS, and Javascript
  • Work with UX Designers, Mobile Architects other Developers to implement full stack web and mobile solutions
  • Work as part of an agile team on leading edge technologies

Skills and Experience:
THE STACK IS IONIC , CORDOVA, ANGULAR 2

  • 5+ years experience developing applications software
  • Demonstrated expertise with HTML5, CSS3 and Responsive Web Design
  • Highly skilled Javascript developer using backbone, angular or similar frameworks
  • Demonstrated knowledge of jQuery and/or jQueryMobile
  • Experience with Oracle, MySql, or PostgreSQL and use of Hibernate, ORMs and/or jdbc
  • Experience with NoSql databases such as MongoDB or CouchDB a plus
  • Understanding of document description languages such as JSON and XML
  • Clear understanding of software development best practices
  • Demonstrated experience working with teams using agile methodologies
  • Working knowledge of SCM with strong emphasis on Git and proper Git Flow
